description: This file defines SQLAlchemy ORM models for a music streaming service, including User, Track, Playlist, RecommendationEvent, and StreamSession classes, along with their relationships and database table configurations.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user in the music streaming service, including user details and relationship to playlists.

classes.name: Track
classes.description: Represents a music track with metadata such as title, artist, album, genre, duration, and cover image.

classes.name: Playlist
classes.description: Represents a user-created playlist containing tracks, with metadata and ownership information.

classes.name: RecommendationEvent
classes.description: Logs user interactions with tracks, such as plays or likes, for recommendation purposes.

classes.name: StreamSession
classes.description: Tracks streaming sessions for users, including start and end times, with a helper method to check if the session is active.

methods.name: is_active
methods.description: Determines if a streaming session is currently active based on the end time and duration.
